column4: In fstab I have this kind of data - UUID=1200c5fe-5d94-42da-8954-de91dcceda22. If I created a new partition and formatted it, how can I find that kind of identifier data?
In fstab I have this kind of data - UUID=1200c5fe-5d94-42da-8954-de91dcceda22. If I created a new partition and formatted it, how can I find that kind of identifier data?
ignore that. id just remove it and put /dev/hda1 or whatever in its place
but if you want you can get the uuid
